rows.label: tlk45500153_01_msg0001
rows.name:
If you're visiting Alba Margen,
you shouldn't miss out on our
famous hot springs.

rows.label: tlk45500153_01_msg0002
rows.name:
I'm sure you must have noticed that
there's natural steam rising from the
ground all over these parts.

rows.label: tlk45500153_01_msg0003
rows.name:
Some of it gets used for energy in
power plants, but other places use
it to heat luxurious public baths.

rows.label: tlk45500153_01_msg0004
rows.name:
Alba Margen is an uptight sort of
place to live in, so the baths are one of
the few opportunities we get to unwind.

rows.label: tlk45500153_01_msg0005
rows.name:
I make sure to visit every day, myself.
Hahaha!
